If you're intrigued by a more mystery-driven plot, you might enjoy "Holes", starring Shia LaBeouf, Sigourney Weaver, and Jon Voight. This film tells the story of a young man searching for the truth about his father's death, uncovering layers of complexity in his own identity along the way. Both films offer compelling narratives that might resonate with you. Enjoy your movie time!
